author: Reuters Editorial
title: Swiss stocks - Factors to watch on Feb 22
text:
ZURICH, Feb 22 (Reuters) - Here are some of the main factors that may affect Swiss stocks on Thursday:
COMPANY STATEMENTS * Cembra Money Bank said its net income rose 1 percent to 144.5 million Swiss francs in 2017. It proposed to increase its dividend to 3.55 francs per share.
* Partners Group sait it raised a total of 3 billion euros for its latest direct private infrastructure offering.
* Santhera Pharmaceuticals said it increased its share capital to pay the upfront consideration for the license to develop and commercialize a clinical stage candidate for pulmonary diseases obtained from Polyphor.
ECONOMY * Swiss industrial orders for Q4 are due at 0815 GMT.
Reporting by Zurich newsroom
